content.text: Magikarp is a cool pokemon

content.author: magikarp
content.text:
I made this cool app to take notes

you can create, read, update, and delete notes!

content.author: magikarp
content.text:
You can change colors of your notes

there's a lot of cool colors

content.author: magikarp
content.text:
This app was created with:

  • Vanilla JS
  • HTML
  • CSS
  • JSON Server
